body_html:
I find the core of the problem. It is the fault of print.

import torch
import cProfile

a = torch.FloatTensor(64,3,256,256)

pr = cProfile.Profile()
pr.enable()

for idx in range(10):
    print(idx)
    print(a)

pr.disable()
pr.print_stats(sort='tottime')

You can test the simple code above. It takes a long time. So I suggest you can make improvement on this.

body:
I find the core of the problem. It is the fault of `print`.

```
import torch
import cProfile

a = torch.FloatTensor(64,3,256,256)

pr = cProfile.Profile()
pr.enable()

for idx in range(10):
    print(idx)
    print(a)

pr.disable()
pr.print_stats(sort='tottime')
```

You can test the simple code above. It takes a long time. So I suggest you can make improvement on this.
